mapper.select: SELECT com.c_id AS CId, com.c_name AS CName FROM t_sims_com AS com LEFT JOIN t_sims_dept AS dept ON dept.c_comid = com.c_id WHERE dept.c_id = #{CId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT c_id AS CId, c_name AS CName FROM t_sims_dept WHERE c_pid = #{CPid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and n_sfyx = 1 order by n_xssx asc
SELECT c_id AS CId, c_name AS CName FROM t_sims_dept WHERE c_comid = #{CComId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c_pid is null and n_sfyx = 1 order by n_xssx asc
SELECT c_id AS CId, c_username AS CUserName FROM t_sims_user WHERE c_deptid = #{CDeptId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and n_sfyx = 1 order by n_xssx asc
SELECT c_id AS CId, c_name AS CName, n_xssx AS NXssx FROM t_sims_com WHERE n_sfyx = 1 ORDER BY n_xssx ASC
